flawed_nl_solution:
Jenny is older than Charlie by 5 years who is older than Bobby by 3 years, so Jenny is older than Bobby by 5+3 = <<13=13>>13 years
Jenny will be twice as old as Bobby when he is 13*2 = <<13*2=26>>26 years old
Jenny is 5 years older than Charlie so when Jenny is 26, Charlie will be 26-5 = <<26-5=21>>21 years old
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
